Room.Name: Path To The Manor
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the brick path that leads straight up to the front door.
Room.LongDescription: The Manor looks much bigger than it did from the road. The creaky wood that has deteriorated over the many years looks like it might fall apart if you sneeze in just the right direction. There is a door directly to the west of you that obviously leads into the creepy manor itself. You have to keep saying to yourself, it's just an old house, nothing more...
